problem_text_cn: 如图,已知直线a∥b∥c,直线m,n与a,b,c分别交于点A,C,E,B,D,F,若AC=4,AE=10,BD=3,则DF的值是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, it is known that a straight line a ∥ b ∥ c, a straight line, n and a, b, c intersect at points A, C, E, B, D, F, if AC = N_0, AE = N_1, BD = N_2, then the value of DF is ()
raw_comment: 本题考查的是平行线分线段成比例定理,灵活运用定理、找准对应关系是解题的关键．
